agentPreferences.description: Symbol-aware code operations for AI agents. Read and edit code by function/class name instead of line numbers. Supports TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, and Rust.

steps: Use list_symbols to get overview of a file
Use read_symbol to read specific functions/classes
Use search_symbols (after indexing) to find symbols across files

editSymbol.description: Edit a specific function or class
steps: Use list_symbols to find the symbol's name path
Use read_symbol to see current implementation
Use edit_symbol to replace the entire body

refactorAcrossFiles.description: Rename or refactor symbols across the codebase
steps: Call index_project to index the codebase first
Use find_references to see all usages
Use rename_symbol with dry_run=true to preview changes
Use rename_symbol to apply the rename

findUsages.description: Find all usages of a symbol
steps: Call index_project if not already indexed
Use find_references with the symbol name
Review definitions vs usages in the output

tips: Always call index_project before using search_symbols, find_references, or rename_symbol
Use list_symbols with depth=0 for just top-level symbols, depth=1 to include class methods
Use read_symbol's context parameter to see surrounding code
Use rename_symbol's dry_run=true to preview changes before applying
After editing files, call index_project again to refresh the index
